title: frankbitcoin
author: frankbitcoin
content: For sale is one single Satori Coin in beautiful condition.   I am not sure if it's prefork or postfork.  Someone here can probably look it up based on the serial number, I don't recall when the switch happened. Confirmed that it is a preforkI'll make the auction in BTC increments.Auction Ends:  Friday June 17th at 7 PM ESTStarting Bid:  .0045BTC (~$99)Bid Increments:  .001BTCSniping:  No.  If a bid is made in the last ten minutes of the auction, the auction will extend an additional ten minutes from that persons bid until no further bid has been made for a full ten minutes.Shipping:  $15 USPS Priority, signature required for delivery, package insured.Pics (I still cant remember how to post them properly lol).  Don't I use the HTML forum script or something?Either way here's the image links:https://imgur.com/a/8I4pzTVhttps://imgur.com/a/pLNTGop

comments.body: Quote from: DebitMe on June 15, 2022, 06:48:24 PMDid you mean bid increments of 0.0001?No, .001, ~$22 bid increments.--current winning bid:  markzellers - .0045
